mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYTRANS( TRAN_ID, TITLE, TRANS_DATE, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, IS_SHARED, CATEGORY, TYPE, MEMO, USER_ID, GROUP_TRAN_ID) VALUES( SEQ_MYTRANS.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{transDate}, #{originalAmount}, #{isShared}, #{category}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{userId}, #{groupTransId})

INSERT INTO GROUPTRANS( TRAN_ID, TITLE, TRANS_DATE, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, CATEGORY, TYPE, MEMO, GROUPB_ID, NICKNAME) VALUES( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{transDate}, #{originalAmount}, #{category}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{groupBId}, #{nickName})
mapper.select: SELECT TRAN_ID AS "transId", TITLE AS "title", TRANS_DATE AS "transDate", ORIGINAL_AMOUNT AS "originalAmount", CATEGORY AS "category", TYPE AS "type", MEMO AS "memo", USER_ID AS "userId", IS_SHARED AS "isShared", GROUP_TRAN_ID AS "groupTransId" FROM MYTRANS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO MYTRANS m USING ( SELECT f.FIXED_ID, f.USER_ID, f.NAME AS TITLE, TRUNC(SYSDATE) AS TRANS_DATE, f.AMOUNT AS ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, 'N' AS IS_SHARED, f.CATEGORY, 'OUT' AS TYPE, '고정지출 자동등록' AS MEMO FROM FIXEDTRANS f WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE), 'DD')) = LEAST( f.PAY_DAY, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(SYSDATE)), 'DD')) ) ) s ON ( m.FIXED_ID = s.FIXED_ID AND TRUNC(m.TRANS_DATE) = s.TRANS_DATE ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( TRAN_ID, TITLE, TRANS_DATE, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, IS_SHARED, CATEGORY, TYPE, MEMO, USER_ID, GROUP_TRAN_ID, FIXED_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_MYTRANS.NEXTVAL, s.TITLE, s.TRANS_DATE, s.ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, s.IS_SHARED, s.CATEGORY, s.TYPE, s.MEMO, s.USER_ID, NULL, s.FIXED_ID )
